item.title: Sandra Hüller to Star in Pawel Pawlikowski’s ‘1949,’ Set at Height of the Cold War
item.description: The Mubi feature also stars Hanns Zischler, August Diehl, Anna Madeley, Devid Streisow and Theo Trebs.
